subject: Public Speaking
title: The Five Elements of Story
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Five Elements of Story.

hook.text: Character, setting, conflict, climax, resolution. Five pillars.

buildup.text: Missing any element makes the story feel incomplete.

discovery.text: Character: who. Setting: where. Conflict: why it matters.

twist.text: Climax: the turning point. Resolution: what changed.

climax.text: Every speech story needs all five, even briefly.

quiz.question: What are the five story elements?
